response.overview: There is nothing more repulsive than the sight of a rotting corpse. Some people argue otherwise, indeed, especially when those corpses died at the cause of a malicious action brought on by another human being. The fact that a human could brutally torture a person to death is horrifying, yes, but is it really more disturbing than the actual carcass which carries the everlasting evidence of merciless crimes being committed? Hardly.
response.tagline: This shockumentary shows the brutal world of humanity and the pornographic abnormality
response.title: PornGore Vol. 1
